discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Delay between keys
Delay between keys - Delay (in seconds) between consecutive keystrokes. The default value is 0.02 seconds. The maximum value is 1 second.
https://docs.uipath.com/activities/other/latest/ui-automation/n-type-into

Selected Answer: B
Answer is B.

questions.question_text: A developer is building a process that types data into input fields using the Hardware Events input method. Which property of the Type Into activity should be modified to reduce the pace at which the input string characters are typed into the fields?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Surround activity with mock.
https://docs.uipath.com/studio/standalone/2023.4/user-guide/mock-testing

choices.D: The activity will remove a Single Line in Run mode and Multi Line in Debug mode.
choices.C: The activity will remove a Single Line in Run mode and in Debug mode.
choices.A: The activity will use only properties set in Activity Project Settings.
choices.B: The activity will remove Multi Line in Run mode and a Single Line in Debug mode.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
From Documentation 'The properties configured in Project Settings only take effect in the activities of the workflow if their properties have not been edited. Editing properties manually no longer applies the project settings to them.' Therefore answer should be C

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C, since SingleLine is set in the activity property.

Selected Answer: D
BOT will remove single line in Run mode and Multiline in Debug mode.

Selected Answer: C
C. The activity will remove a Single Line in Run mode and in Debug mode.

questions.question_text: To retrieve all Outlook emails with the word "UiPath" in the subject, which filtering property and filter schema should a developer use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Property: Filter -
Schema: "@SQL=""urn:schemas:httpmail:subject"" like '%UiPath%'"
https://docs.uipath.com/activities/other/latest/productivity/get-outlook-mail-messages#filtering-examples
